article_node.title: Horizons Middle East & Africa 8/22/2025
article_node.summary: NVIDIA has reportedly instructed suppliers, including Samsung, to halt production of its H20 AI chip due to security concerns raised by Beijing, impacting market sentiment ahead of Jerome Powell's speech at Jackson Hole. Meanwhile, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is weighing military plans for Gaza City while negotiating for the release of hostages. In the financial markets, caution prevails as traders adjust their expectations for potential Fed rate cuts, with U.S. equity futures remaining flat.
